page.title: 11S.V.R. Santa Special
page.content:
{Severn Valley Railway "Santa Special" {by Alison Titley, aged 9.}
When we got to the station it was decorated like it was Christmas. There was a Christmas tree with tinsel & chocolate bunny rabbits & pussy cats & puppy dogs. It was just like Christmas. Then we got on the train to go to Bridgnorth. On the train a man came round with some chocolates and wine gums. When we got to Bridgnorth we went on a reindeer ride, it took us to Santa Claus. We had our photo taken with him and he gave us a mug with "Severn Valley" on it. I thought it was the best day of my life.
